dcterms:creator: Eyal Liron Dolev
dcterms:description: A trilingual corpus containing press releases made by the Canton of Grisons in German, Romansh, and Italian over the past 25 years, consisting of 4,547 parallel documents and approximately 100,000 sentence pairs in each language combination.
dcterms:title: DERMIT (DE-RM-IT) corpus

dcterms:creator: Eyal Liron Dolev
dcterms:description: A gold standard consisting of 600 German-Romansh sentence pairs annotated for word alignment, created to evaluate different word-alignment systems.
dcterms:title: Gold standard for German-Romansh word alignment

dcterms:creator: Yves Scherrer
Bruno Cartoni
dcterms:description: A trilingual corpus that can be used for lexicon induction, consisting of parallel texts in German, Romansh, and Italian.
dcterms:title: ALLEGRA corpus
